messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

failed with errors change manager for failed with errors change manager for hello trying change for but request getting failed with following message task completed task outcome cannot be empty please provide assistance sent friday december failed with errors change manager for access task application failed with errors change manager for change layout one column two columns two columns narrow left two columns narrow right columns columns narrow sides two columns below wide area two columns above wide area details assignee assigned date task number recommended actions description transaction id requestor task id task title change manager for task status composite name composite instance id error message task completed task outcome cannot be empty module identifier related links comments data display history updated by action performed assignee updated assigned dec completed dec
